short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The wonderful Buffer Values replace your New Tab Page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Buffer values are an important and vital part of the company. They're inspirational, aspirational, and just great words to live by. This New Tab Page is a shout-out to them, and an attempt to look at them more often.

:)

https://buffer.com/values

The extension is open-source: https://github.com/pioul/Buffer-Values-New-Tab-Page
